title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: NoneCourse ContentsEconomic growth and social development; social and political aspects of development planning; The political characteristics of new states in third world countries; Understanding cultural units, cultural diversity, language, education and the mass media; Religion and economic development; socio-political and economic institutions.
